titles.title: Distillery Excise Tax Reform Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the rate of tax regarding the taxation of distilled spirits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/25/2014--Introduced. Distillery Excise Tax Reform Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the rate of the excise tax on distilled spirits to $2.70 per proof gallon (currently, $13.50 per proof gallon) on the first 100,000 gallons produced by a distilled spirits producer during the calendar year.
